text: The Ivorian Football Federation (; FIF) is the governing body of football in Ivory Coast. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded in 1960 and joined CAF in the same year. It also became a member of FIFA in 1964. Category:1960 establishments in Africa Category:Football governing bodies in Africa Category:Football in Ivory Coast
title: Ivorian Football Federation
